titleStmt.title: The necessity & use of heresies, or, The third and last part of The great question about indifferent things in religious worship containing an answer to the objection against liberty of conscience, from the growth and spreading of heresies / by Edward Bagshaw ...
titleStmt.author: Bagshaw, Edward, 1629-1671.

titleStmt.title: The necessity & use of heresies, or, The third and last part of The great question about indifferent things in religious worship containing an answer to the objection against liberty of conscience, from the growth and spreading of heresies / by Edward Bagshaw ...
titleStmt.author: Bagshaw, Edward, 1629-1671.

notesStmt.note: Bagshaw's The great question concerning things indifferent in religious worship" was published in 1660. The second part was published in 1661. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
